TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MimeTextMatch extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a text pattern for which the HTTP transmission is searched. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `MimeTextMatch` class.
[!code-cpp[MimeText_Binding_Match_8#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.de_26_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[MimeText_Binding_Match_8#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_26_1.cs)] [!code-vb[MimeText_Binding_Match_8#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.de_26_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a value indicating the zero-based index of a within a group.
Docs.value: A 32-bit signed integer. The default value is 0, indicating that the is the first instance within a group.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Group%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Matches%2A> properties.
## Examples [!code-cpp[MimeTextMatch_5#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.de_43_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[MimeTextMatch_5#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.de_43_1.vb)] [!code-cs[MimeTextMatch_5#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.de_43_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of groups in which to place the results of the text search.
Docs.value: A 32-bit signed integer. The default value is 1.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The value of this property must be less than or equal to the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Repeats%2A> property, or the XML Web service will not compile correctly.
## Examples [!code-cpp[MimeTextMatch_5#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.de_57_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[MimeTextMatch_5#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.de_57_1.vb)] [!code-cs[MimeTextMatch_5#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.de_57_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the search should disregard the case of the text to be searched.
Docs.value: if the search should disregard case; otherwise, . The default is .

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of text pattern matches that have been found by the search.
Docs.value: A representing the members of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Group%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the .
Gets or sets the text pattern for the search.
Docs.value: A string representing the text for which to search the HTTP transmission. The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks The value of this property can contain wildcard characters.
## Examples [!code-cpp[MimeText_Binding_Match_8#6](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.de_17_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[MimeText_Binding_Match_8#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.de_17_1.cs)] [!code-vb[MimeText_Binding_Match_8#6](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.de_17_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of times the search is to be performed.
Docs.value: A 32-bit signed integer. The default value is 1.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In a case where more than one match is possible, a property value of 1 will return only the first match found. A value of <xref:System.Int32> will return all matches.
This property returns the same information as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.RepeatsString%2A> property, but as a 32-bit signed integer rather than as a string.
## Examples [!code-cpp[MimeTextMatch_5#4](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.de_16_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[MimeTextMatch_5#4](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.de_16_1.vb)] [!code-cs[MimeTextMatch_5#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.de_16_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of times the search is to be performed.
Docs.value: A string indicating the number of times the search is to be performed. The default value is "1".

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property returns the same information as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Repeats%2A> property, but as a string rather than as a 32-bit signed integer. A value of "*" corresponds to <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>.
## Examples [!code-cpp[MimeTextMatch_5#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.de_79_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[MimeTextMatch_5#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.de_79_1.vb)] [!code-cs[MimeTextMatch_5#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.de_79_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the MIME format of the text to be searched.
Docs.value: A string indicating the MIME format of the text to be searched.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property returns an empty string ("") if its value has not been set.
## Examples MimeText_Binding_Match_8#5
